name: Roll4 Initiative
description:
My submission for the GMTK Game Jam. Had lots of fun! PLEASE let me know in the comments what's your longest record.

Turn based strategy game where you must wager your options carefully or be taken by the Zombie Horde.  Roll the dice to defeat any zombies that get in your way. Manage your health wisely to make it as long as you possibly can.

HOW TO:

You have 3 rolls per turn. To select a Die, tap on it. Click and drag to move them around if needed. Whatever die is selected will be kept and you'll reroll the non selected dice.

  • The Fist is small damage but a guaranteed hit
  • The Gun damage stacks, but has a chance to miss
  • The Potion heals you for 1hp, and can cure you of poison when rolling two.
  • A Miss cannot be rerolled so be careful with your choices

Collect new dice and to aid you in your survival.

Try and make it as long as you can....

GOOD LUCK!!
